name: Illumio
description: This plugin is used to pull IOCs of the type URLs (IP Addresses and Hostname) from Workloads on the Illumio PCE based on the configured Label scope. This plugin does not support sharing of indicators to Illumio platform.

configuration.label: PCE URL
configuration.description: Base URL of your Illumio Platform - e.g. https://my.pce.com

configuration.label: PCE Port Number
configuration.description: PCE port number - use 443 for SaaS instances.

configuration.label: PCE Organization ID
configuration.description: Illumio PCE Organization ID from My API Keys.

configuration.label: API Authentication Username
configuration.description: API Authentication Username generated on the Illumio PCE from My API Keys.

configuration.label: API Secret
configuration.description: API Secret generated on the Illumio PCE from My API Keys.

configuration.label: Label Scope
configuration.description: One or more label key/value pairs that make up the policy scope for threat workloads. Must be of the format key1:value1,key2:value2,... For example: env:Quarantine,loc:ca

configuration.label: Enable Tagging
configuration.description: Whether or not to create tags for Threat IoCs based on their labels.
